info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 10 at 6:23PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Grant and northwestern Hidalgo Counties through 700 PM MDT... At 622 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 4 miles northeast of Lordsburg, moving northwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 45 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects, in addition to create areas of blowing dust. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible, and low visibility along Interstate 10. Locations impacted include... Steins, Lordsburg, Lordsburg Playa and Shakespeare. This includes Interstate 10 in New Mexico between mile markers 4 and 28. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
